channel.title: Could someone please help (Read More)
channel.description: hey could someone help me fix my shop.. this is my problem.. i have a shop that in order to buy things you need to have pk points.. i would like to know how could i change the amount of pk points it takes to buy a item from that shop... please help me.. and where could i find the coordinates for all my shops.. i got some shops in my shops list that i never seen and wanna tele to them with coordinates plz help me..
